verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH935>, When ye are come into the land<WH776> of your habitations<WH4186>, which I give unto you<WH5414>,

and will make<WH6213> an offering by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, a burnt-offering<WH5930>, or a sacrifice<WH2077>, to accomplish<WH6381> a vow<WH5088>, or as a freewill-offering<WH5071>, or in your set feasts<WH4150>, to make<WH6213> a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, of the herd<WH1241>, or of the flock<WH6629>;

then shall he that offereth<WH7126> his oblation<WH7133> offer<WH7126> unto Jehovah<WH3068> a meal-offering<WH4503> of a tenth part of an ephah<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with the fourth<WH7243> part of a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081>:

and wine<WH3196> for the drink-offering<WH5262>, the fourth<WH7243> part of a hin<WH1969>, shalt thou prepare<WH6213> with the burnt-offering<WH5262>, or for the sacrifice<WH2077>, for each<WH259> lamb<WH3532>.

Or for a ram<WH352>, thou shalt prepare<WH6213> for a meal-offering<WH4503> two<WH8147> tenth parts of an ephah<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with the third<WH7992> part of a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081>:
and for the drink-offering<WH5262> thou shalt offer<WH7126> the third<WH7992> part of a hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196>, of a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
And when thou preparest<WH6213> a bullock<WH1121> for a burnt-offering<WH5930>, or for a sacrifice<WH2077>, to accomplish<WH6381> a vow<WH5088>, or for peace-offerings<WH2077> unto Jehovah<WH3068>;

then shall he offer<WH7126> with the bullock<WH1241> a meal-offering<WH4503> of three<WH7969> tenth parts of an ephah<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with half<WH2677> a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081>:
and thou shalt offer<WH7126> for the drink-offering<WH5262> half<WH2677> a hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196>, for an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
Thus shall it be done<WH6213> for each<WH259> bullock<WH7794>, or for each<WH259> ram<WH352>, or for each of the he-lambs<WH3532>, or of the kids<WH5795>.
According to the number<WH4557> that ye shall prepare<WH6213>, so<WH3602> shall ye do<WH6213> to every one<WH259> according to their number<WH4557>.
All that are home-born<WH249> shall do<WH6213> these things after this manner<WH7126>, in offering an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

And if a stranger<WH1616> sojourn<WH1481> with you<WH8432>, or whosoever may be among you throughout your generations<WH1755>, and will offer<WH6213> an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>; as ye do<WH6213>, so he shall do<WH6213>.

For the assembly<WH6951>, there shall be one<WH259> statute<WH2708> for you<WH1616>, and for the stranger that sojourneth<WH1481> with you<WH2708>, a statute for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755>: as ye are<WH1616>, so shall the sojourner be before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>.
One <WH259> law<WH8451> and one<WH259> ordinance<WH4941> shall be for you<WH1616>, and for the stranger that sojourneth with you<WH1481>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH935>, When ye come into the land<WH776> whither I bring you<WH935>,
then it shall be<WH398>, that, when ye eat of the bread<WH3899> of the land<WH776>, ye shall offer up<WH7311> a heave-offering<WH8641> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

Of the first<WH7225> of your dough<WH6182> ye shall offer up<WH7311> a cake<WH2471> for a heave-offering<WH8641>: as the heave-offering<WH8641> of the threshing-floor<WH1637>, so shall ye heave it<WH7311>.
Of the first<WH7225> of your dough<WH6182> ye shall give<WH5414> unto Jehovah<WH3068> a heave-offering<WH8641> throughout your generations<WH1755>.
And when ye shall err<WH7686>, and not observe<WH6213> all these commandments<WH4687>, which Jehovah<WH3068> hath spoken<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>,
even all that Jehovah<WH3068> hath commanded<WH6680> you by Moses<WH4872>, from the day<WH3117> that Jehovah<WH3068> gave commandment<WH1755>, and onward throughout your generations;

then it shall be<WH6213>, if it be done unwittingly<WH7684>, without the knowledge<WH5869> of the congregation<WH5712>, that all the congregation<WH5712> shall offer<WH6213> one<WH259> young<WH1121> bullock<WH6499> for a burnt-offering<WH5930>, for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, with the meal-offering<WH4503> thereof<WH4503>, and the drink-offering thereof<WH4941>, according to the ordinance, and<WH8163> one<WH259> he-goat<WH5795> for a sin-offering<WH2403>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and they shall be forgiven<WH5545>; for it was an error<WH7684>, and they have brought<WH935> their oblation<WH7133>, an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, and their sin-offering<WH2403> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, for their error<WH7684>:

and all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall be forgiven<WH5545>, and the stranger<WH1616> that sojourneth<WH1481> among<WH8432> them<WH5971>; for in respect of all the people it was done unwittingly<WH7684>.
And if one<WH5315> person<WH5315> sin<WH2398> unwittingly<WH7684>, then he shall offer<WH7126> a she-goat<WH5795> a<WH1323> year<WH8141> old for a sin-offering<WH2403>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for the soul<WH5315> that erreth<WH7683>, when he sinneth<WH2398> unwittingly<WH7684>, before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, to make atonement<WH3722> for him<WH5545>; and he shall be forgiven.

Ye shall have one<WH259> law<WH8451> for him that doeth aught<WH6213> unwittingly<WH7684>, for him that is home-born<WH249> among the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and for the stranger<WH1616> that sojourneth<WH1481> among them<WH8432>.

But the soul<WH5315> that doeth<WH6213> aught with a high hand<WH7311>, whether he be home-born<WH249> or a sojourner<WH4480>, the same blasphemeth<WH1442> Jehovah<WH3068>; and that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> his people<WH5971>.

Because he hath despised<WH959> the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and hath broken<WH6565> his commandment<WH4687>, that soul<WH5315> shall utterly<WH3772> be cut off<WH3772>; his iniquity shall be upon him<WH5771>.
And while the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were in the wilderness<WH4057>, they found<WH4672> a man<WH376> gathering<WH7197> sticks<WH6086> upon the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>.
And they that found<WH4672> him gathering<WH7197> sticks<WH6086> brought<WH7126> him unto Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175>, and unto all the congregation<WH5712>.
And they put<WH3240> him in ward<WH4929>, because it had not been declared<WH6567> what should be done to him<WH6213>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, The man<WH376> shall surely<WH4191> be put to death<WH4191>: all the congregation<WH5712> shall stone<WH7275> him with stones<WH7275> without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>.
And all the congregation<WH5712> brought<WH3318> him without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>, and stoned<WH7275> him to death<WH4191> with stones<WH68>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and bid<WH559> them that they make<WH6213> them fringes<WH6734> in the borders<WH3671> of their garments<WH899> throughout their generations<WH1755>, and that they put<WH5414> upon the fringe<WH6734> of each border<WH3671> a cord<WH6616> of blue<WH8504>:

and it shall be unto you for a fringe<WH6734>, that ye may look<WH7200> upon it<WH2142>, and remember all the commandments<WH4687> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and do<WH6213> them<WH8446>; and that ye follow not after<WH310> your own heart<WH3824> and your own eyes<WH5869>, after<WH310> which ye use to play the harlot<WH2181>;
that ye may remember<WH2142> and do<WH6213> all my commandments<WH4687>, and be<WH1961> holy<WH6918> unto your God<WH430>.
I am Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, who brought you out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, to be your God<WH430>: I am Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
